name: Shipping Manager For WooCommerce
author: Mohamed Saad

sections.description:
Converts the city field to a dropdown, allowing the addition of custom cities with rates and easily adding custom WooCommerce shipping zones (city – country – state)[Pro], and also (show/hide) shipping checkout fields and changing the city field label.

Free Plugin Features

  • Add unlimited custom city options.
  • Customize city field label.
  • Convert checkout city text field to dropdown.
  • Customize dropdown city options.
  • Customize dropdown city shipping rates and costs.
  • Disable custom billing fields.
  • Disable custom shipping fields.
  • Select city’s parent country.

Premium Plugin Features

  • Add custom WooCommerce shipping zones (city – country – state).
  • Select rates base section (billing fields section – shipping fields section).
  • Convert dropdown checkout cities to text field prediction.

Got any issues:

Contact via Plugin support forums.

Premium Version Support

Upgrade To Premium Version

Also we provide a WordPress proffissonal support services with both free and premium plans.

WPSAAD Free WordPress Plugins

  • WordPress Images Alt Manager
  • WooCommerce Custom Produdct Type
  • WooCommerce Shipping Manager

sections.installation: Just install the plugin on your WordPress website and then you will be able to use Shipping Manager For WooCommerce awesome features(Be sure WooCommerce is active).
sections.faq:
Why You need This plugin?

This plugin customize Woocommerce checkout Shipping process with awesome control featrues

Can i use city field to display something else?

Yes off course you can do so by change the field label and then put values and rates you need but be aware that all cities options is connected to a parent country.

Price not updating?

Make sure that you are setting a fixed rate all cities. you can do that from Woocommerce settings -> shipping -> add shipping zone -> Locations not covered by your other zones (Add shipping method) then select flat rate and then edit flat rate and add your default cost

short_description: Adds Custom cities and custom WooCommerce Shipping zones, convert checkout city field to dropdown and more awesome features.
